about_the_game:
This is the VisualNovel Maker version of Welcome To... Chichester 2, and is the one that the main version is based on.

To run the program you need to go in the WTC 2 directory/VN Maker and double-click on Game.exe

There is a known problem with the Backlog

content_descriptors.notes:
- Comedic violence (with possibility of protagonist death)
- Censored nudity
- Appearance of choice for sexual assault 
- Appearance of sexual assault

detailed_description:
This is the VisualNovel Maker version of Welcome To... Chichester 2, and is the one that the main version is based on.

To run the program you need to go in the WTC 2 directory/VN Maker and double-click on Game.exe

There is a known problem with the Backlog

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part I : The Spy Of Chichester And The Eager Tourist Guide HD Edition

legal_notice:
Some graphics are from Pexels and some sounds are from Freesound
Music by Hardcastle and Josh Woodward.
Sound effects by Taira Komori "Let's Play with Free Sound Effects"
name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 : VNMaker Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
  • Additional Notes: Note : System must be capable of running a resolution of at least 720p at 16:9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
  • Additional Notes: Note : System must be capable of running a resolution of at least 720p at 16:9

short_description: Original (but upgraded) version, written in VN Maker
